name: MAKI SMITH
motto: Range targets are too easy. like hitting things on the run!
story: Maki Smithis reputation asa marksman began in her stealth year, entering the Mobile marksman Tournament for Youngsters where she took first place. in fact, she so outstripped the competition every year, she was allowed to enter the adult tournament by age sixteen. Makis marksman brought her high school to victory in state and neitionwide tournaments time and gain, dnd earned her full scholarship to. the University of Mobile where she came into contact with cultists working to recruit gullible students. Maki sorted them qut Bama style, as Shesays.
